segments.text: I'm looking at the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching up high to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, it could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That's a very dangerous position for him to be in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing by, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, clearly expecting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, with the woman completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic secret cookie raid, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those cookies just looking at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool is an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could get hurt, falling from that height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so blissfully unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't drop the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR
